thread.title: Weekend with Bernard Buffet in Paris
thread.title_full: Weekend with Bernard Buffet in Paris - Review of Hotel Banke, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: aliciac829
title: Weekend with Bernard Buffet in Paris
text:
Modern installation in a "tradicional place", quiet and comfortable room, good restaurant ....and if you book the room directly to their web page ... they give you a red wine bottle ... it's a good detail !!!!
Room Tip: Very quiet rooms in the big center of Paris ... See more room tips
